tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Smile like a ceramic beauty is the mantra I started following when I went through ceramic braces.
Amazing doctors, friendly behaviour, always in constant touch with patients. Instant results in the treatment. Undoubtedly I made the best decision walking at Dr. Amit Bhatia's clinic and definitely going through a friendly brace treatment. 
Would love to recommend his treatment and his team. 
#smilewithbrace
#smileistheinstantbeauty
#wearbraceslikeacrown
 Thank you for all help and giving me the faith that I can smile lavishly with braces and after treatment.ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Amit Bhatia is a very professional dentist and knows his job well and does it with all the expertise. He has a great staff to complement him, and assure the patient is at ease before every procedure. The most enduring part is the way he explains your condition and discusses the procedure with you and  addresses all your concerns. Also the rates here are quite reasonable compared to other clinics.

I got my ceramic braces treatment done by Dr. Amit Bhatia and Dr. Vanya. I am very much satisfied with the undergone process which got finished within the stipulated time lot as promised. Both Doctors were very polite in their behaviour and co-ordinated very well with me with my variable time frames. With the good experience that I had within past 1.5 years, I recommended one of my colleagues for the ortho treatment and  would  also keep recommending it in the future. Thankyou once again...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am undergoing braces treatment by Dr. Vanya and Dr Amit Bhatia. They both are very experienced and always ready to explain and share knowledge related to treatment. I am very happy with the results, which made me recommend them to my mother, who is going through tooth extraction and fillings.

Got ceramic braces done from Dr.amit bhatia **** ** *** ** ** ****** *** **** ***************.I had all irregular teeth a year back and now after 8 months all my teeth are well aligned...very happy with the results...very satisfied the way he did the treatment .....thanks Dr.amit

Very experienced doctor I would say with magical and healing hands I was suffering from very throbbing pain I was told by Dr. Amit bhatia that I require rct treatment and he did the whole rct procedure in single sitting and my pain was gone only in one visit all credit goes to Dr.amit....thanks doc

I got my root canal done from Dr.Amit Bhatia , it was a wonderful experience . the politeness and gentleness during the treatment of the dr.Amit and his entire staff made me to take complete treatment without any hassle . treatment plan was well designed for me so that my professional work would not be at a stake . 
I would definitely recommend Dr. Amit for all your dental needs.

Doctor is very polite and friendly and he diagnosed and explained me regarding my dental problem ......which made me more confident to go for the treatment......next time you want to see any doctor for dental care please do take an appointment with Dr Amit bhatia...... I strongly recommend him........

review: Hi viewers,I have got ceramic braces treatment from Dr. Amit Bhatia's dental clinic it's been 2 years now in very affordable cost. he is one of the most reliable doctors. You don't need to worry for any kind of consultation and appointments. They will call you time to time for your monthly appointments, all thanks to their administration. My teeth are very much aligned then before. I can smile without any hesitation and I am very much satisfied with their service.
